text:
@SecPompeo Hi @SecPompeo, What are you going to do about #Trump's early inaction and denial of #COVID19? Isn't investigating Trump's failure to act useful to prevent many deaths in America in a future pandemic?
As of May 3, the USA accounts for 27% deaths &  33% cases. This is a sad story.
